Module it.polimi.ingsw.am38
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Model.Cards

Class PlayableCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Model.Cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Model.Cards.PlayableCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldCard, ResourceCard, StarterCard
public abstract class PlayableCard extends Card
This is the abstract class that represents the cards that the player could place in his field

  • Method Details

    • getCorner

      public Corner getCorner(Orientation orientation)
      Getter for a specific corner of the card
      Parameters:
      orientation - is the coordinate (NW,NE,SW,SE) of the corner needed
      Returns:
      the corner in a specific position on the card

    • getOrder

      public int getOrder()
      Getter to know in which turn a card has been placed
      Returns:
      the int that represents the turn in which the card has been played

    • setOrder

      public void setOrder(int order)
      This method set the parameter that represents the turn in which the card has been played

    • getFace

      public boolean getFace()
      Getter for the face on which a card is placed
      Returns:
      the side of the card visible once it has been played

    • setFace

      public void setFace(boolean face)
      This method set the parameter that represents the side visible of the card on the field

    • getKingdom

      public Symbol getKingdom()
      Getter for the kingdom of a card
      Returns:
      the kingdom of a card (i.e. the color of the card)

    • getPointsPerCondition

      public int getPointsPerCondition()
      Getter for the points given per every time the condition is satisfied
      Returns:
      the points that a card could give to the player if placed face up for each satisfied condition

    • play

      public abstract int play(Player player, Coords coords) throws NoPossiblePlacement, NotPlaceableException
      Abstract method used by the Player to place a PlayableCard at given Coords
      Parameters:
      player - the one who plays the PlayableCard
      coords - the position in which the Player wants to play it
      Returns:
      the points scored by placing the PlayableCard (if any are scored)
      Throws:
      NoPossiblePlacement - if the Coords chosen aren't valid/available
      NotPlaceableException
